unknown_command: Unfortunately, this command is still unknown to me, select one from the list and I will be happy to help you)

message.period: How often do you want to exercise?
message.result:
Your class will take place on {date} at {time}.
You indicated that you want to study {period}.
The teacher will contact you via Telegram.
message.event_actions: What do you want to do with the selected event?

start.message:
Hi, this is a chatbot for recording classes in English and Italian.
There is a list of available commands at the bottom:)

change_locale.message: Select the language in which you want to continue communication

edit.message: Select the event you want to edit

info.message:
Bot for creating schedule entries
Author: Bykovskii Aleksei(@aybykovskii)

cancel.title: Cancel
cancel.message: Select the date you want to cancel the event

error:
An error occurred, try again later, or report the error to the bot author.

Information about the author can be found in the /info command
